mdRecord.dcterms:title: Doctor's bag
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black leather bag containing the following instruments (00718a): vaginal speculum; 00718b: vaginal speculum; 00718c: Bozeman's dressing forceps (10"); 00718d: Bozeman's dressing forceps, Klein Germany (10"); 00718e: polypus forceps (9"); 00718f: splinter forceps, F.A. Kock & Co. Germany (4.5"); 00718g: needle holder (5.5"); 00718h: retractor? Sklar stainless; 00718i: unidentifed instrument. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bags
Medical instruments and apparatus
